faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers about CelesteIQ's AI, Microsoft solutions, and global operations.

item-1.question: What makes CelesteIQ different from other technology providers?
item-1.answer: We specialize in connecting Artificial Intelligence with the real needs of your business, creating complete solutions within the Microsoft ecosystem (Azure, Power BI, Copilot, Dynamics, etc.).

item-2.question: Do I need prior AI experience to implement your solutions?
item-2.answer: No—our team guides you through strategy, design, and implementation. We’ll identify the best use cases and deliver value quickly.

item-3.question: Which sectors do you serve?
item-3.answer: Finance, Healthcare, Manufacturing, Real Estate, and more. We tailor solutions to your industry’s compliance and operational needs.

item-4.question: Do you offer subscription-based or project-based services?
item-4.answer: Both. Choose ongoing subscription for continuous optimization or a fixed-scope project for targeted outcomes—whichever fits your goals.

item-5.question: Where do you operate?
item-5.answer: We support clients globally with remote delivery and regional partners when on-site presence is required.
